ygData.subject: Re: List activity? Let get it going.
ygData.msgSnippet: You call plus 10 charisma a WASTE???? combine that with my amulet and tunic and get a +20 charisma..you know what kind of price savings you can get with
ygData.messageBody:
You call plus 10 charisma a WASTE????

combine that with my amulet and tunic and get a +20 charisma..you know what
kind of price savings you can get with that????? Or how much your own wares
will sell to NPC's for???

You don't have to use it as a weapon, for gods sake. I don't use the amulet
or tunic except when buying and selling either. man....you get one of those
staves, just pass it along to me...seeing as you don't think they are worth
having around. =)

L8R,

Thadius of Qeynos

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Vince Montana [mailto:montana@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 8:09 AM
> To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] List activity? Let get it going.
>
>
> From: "Vince Montana" <montana@...>
>
> the staff sucks, dont waste your time, its like 5/33 and adds 10 to
> charisma. its really a waste
>
> Danek HealFast
> Leader of the BlackMoon

> From: Scott Pflanzer <pflanzer@...>

> > but the quest that I am having a hard time with is the peacekeeper staff
> > quest

> > if this staff is not usable by the Magi Classes then I will abandon the
> > quest due to the fact that I have not found one of the items needed to
> > complete the quest.
> >
